headline: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: 2025 was a strong year for Keurig Dr Pepper Inc.. We delivered healthy results that achieved our annual guidance.  Net sales increased almost 9% driven by approximately five points of growth from our base business and a nearly four point ghost contribution.

raw.headline: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper (NASDAQ:KDP) Exceeds Q4 CY2025 Expectations
